recipe.notes: Dennis made these for a string of appearances, occasionally command performances. They are mighty tasty down-home stylee (I mean, yeah -- Velveeta!). Two packages of rye might be a bit much depending on how much you spoon on there.

ingredient.ingredient_name: Velveeta Cheese, Cut Into Small Cubes

recipe.name: Dennis's Meaty Cheesy Things
recipe.preparation:
Saute the beef, sausage and onions in a pan. Drain off the fat. Add the Italian Seasoning & Velveeta and stir over low heat until the velveeta has softened and the ingredients have mixed togehter.
Spoon a tablespoon or two of mixture onto each rye toast and place on a cooking sheet.
Can be made ahead and frozen. Heat mixture under a broiler until the rye browns slightly.
